name: @cross-nn/browser
description: Browser module of cross-platform neural network
author: Andrey Vasin <vofuss@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build:typings
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build src/*.ts --out-dir dist
scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel watch test/nn-worker.ts --out-dir dist/test --out-file nn-worker.js & parcel serve test/index.html --out-dir dist/test
